bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Botts family were distantly related to John Minor Botts, 1802-1869, a prominent lawyer and politician in Virginia during the nineteenth century.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains approximately 11 items from various descendants and relatives of John Minor Botts (1802-1969), all discussing Botts family genealogy.
